---
title: "Report from stocksmart data pull"
output: html_document
params: 
  sumrowAdd: NA
  sumrowRem: NA
  sumcolAdd: NA
  sumcolRem: NA
  datrowAdd: NA
  datrowRem: NA
  datcolAdd: NA
  datcolRem: NA
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Summary data changes

### Species Added
```{r, echo = F}
if(!is.null(params$sumrowAdd)) {
  params$sumrowAdd %>%
    dplyr::mutate(`ITIS Taxon Serial Number` = paste0("(",`ITIS Taxon Serial Number`,"):")) %>%
    kableExtra::kable()
}
```

### Species Removed
```{r, echo = F}
if(!is.null(params$sumrowRem)){
params$sumrowRem %>%
  dplyr::mutate(`ITIS Taxon Serial Number` = paste0("(",`ITIS Taxon Serial Number`,"):")) %>%
  kableExtra::kable(col.names =NULL)
}
```

### Columns added
```{r, echo = F}
kableExtra::kable(params$sumcolAdd,col.names =NULL)
```

### Columns removed
```{r, echo = F}
kableExtra::kable(params$sumcolRem,col.names =NULL)
```


# Time series data changes

### Species Added
```{r, echo = F}
if(!is.null(params$datrowAdd)){
  params$datrowAdd %>% 
    dplyr::select(-StockArea) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(ITIS = paste0("(",ITIS,"):")) %>%
    kableExtra::kable()
}
```

### Species Removed
```{r, echo = F}
if(!is.null(params$datrowRem)) {
  params$datrowRem %>% 
    dplyr::select(-StockArea) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(ITIS = paste0("(",ITIS,"):")) %>%
    kableExtra::kable(col.names =NULL)
}
```

### Columns added
